title: BBC Local Live: Beds, Herts & Bucks on Thursday 24 September 2015. - BBC News
summary: beds police have referred themselves to the ipcc after a crash victim was left in a ditch .
four people have been injured after an ambulance on its way to a 999 call was involved in a collision with a car .
news , sport , travel and weather updates resume at 08:00 on friday .

documents.title: our live coverage throughout the day
text: that 's all for local live across beds , herts and bucks .
we 'll be back tomorrow from 08:00 .

documents.title: potters bar murder accused says he tried to save victim
text: a polish man accused of murdering a wealthy gambler in his potters bar home has denied the charge and said he tried to save the man 's life .
milton papadopoulos , 41 , was found dead in his flat last october .
sebastian kimel , 40 , told the old bailey he and two others were to collect a debt from mr papadopoulos when another conspirator lost control and beat him .
mr kimel told jurors he 'd given mr papadopoulos cpr after waking up from being knocked out himself .
author: Dani Bailey
BBC Local Live

documents.title: gbbo : nadiya was 'so excited ' she 'could streak ' ooh-err !
text: a religieuse a l'ancienne was the show stopper task for bakers last night on gbbo - that 's eclair tower to you and i .
luton 's nadiya said she was `` dreading '' making her tower of bubblegum and peppermint cream eclairs because of eight `` disasters '' including `` landslides '' and `` explosions '' .
but even with a little topple after a two hour lunchbreak , nadiya got her hands on star baker for the second time .
i 'm so excited i could streak down that river ! ''
author: Dani Bailey
BBC Local Live

documents.title: man charged with manslaughter after dunstable attack
text: a man has been charged with manslaughter after a man died following an attack outside a dunstable nightclub last month .
the 21-year-old from luton has been bailed and will appear before magistrates in october .
tomas juska , 24 , from lithuania died in hospital the day after the attack outside club cookies on 23 august .

documents.title: hs2 : opposition campaigner says inviting chinese bids is 'mercenary '
text: the campaign group opposing hs2 says chancellor george osbourne is jumping the gun by inviting companies in china to bid on building contracts .
richard houghton from the hs2 action alliance has described the actions as `` mercenary '' and `` dismissive of the parliamentary process '' .

documents.title: bailey mcconnell takes over bbc introducing
text: on saturday night , 16-year-old singer-songwriter bailey mcconnell from milton keynes took over our show .
here is his live performance of his track power within
author: BBC Introducing... in Beds, Herts and Bucks

documents.title: no trains between st albans and watford
text: national rail
nationalrailenq
no trains between st albans abbey and watford junction expected until 17:30 # abbeylinetwt.lt/o27e
no trains between st albans abbey and watford junction expected until 17:30 # abbeyline

documents.title: st albans wall collapse death : directors 'failed to show remorse '
text: the directors of building firm linley developments , responsible for the death of 28-year-old gareth jones when a wall collapsed at a building site in st albans , `` failed to show any remorse , '' according to the victim 's wife , lianne jones .
trevor hyatt and alfred baker were today found guilty of corporate manslaughter , given six month suspended sentences and ordered to pay nearly £ 38,000 in costs .
the fact gareth 's death was entirely preventable has made this tragedy even more heart-breaking . ''

documents.title: st albans wall collapse death : 'i miss gareth every second of every day '
text: lianne jones , wife of 28-year-old gareth jones , says she `` lost my best friend , our future and a big part of myself '' when her husband died after a wall collapsed at a building site in st albans .
the directors of welwyn-based linley developments have today been given suspended sentences for corporate manslaughter .
mrs jones said : `` i miss him every second of every day and even after two and a half years the grief and pain in my heart is as strong as the day it happened . ''

documents.title: st albans wall collapse death : victim was 'one in a million '
text: the wife of a man who died when a wall collapsed at a st albans building site said her husband was `` one in a million '' .
the directors of welwyn-based linley developments have today been given six month suspended sentences for corporate mansluaghter relating to the death of gareth jones .
he was funny , mischievous , intelligent , kind , always laughing ''

documents.title: gbbo : 'i 'm not making that , it 's really fiddly '
text: the second challenge of baking mokatines in last night 's bake off was met with a quip from luton 's nadiya : `` i did actually see this in mary berry 's book .
did i read it ?
no , i thought 'i 'm not going to make that , that will be really fiddly ' . ''
and fiddly the task was indeed !
but nadiya need n't have worried , as simply glancing at the book was obviously enough - she bagged first place .
it 's looking like the that i saw in the book , which is bizarre ''
author: Dani Bailey
BBC Local Live

documents.title: st albans wall collapse death : directors sentenced and ordered to pay £ 38k
text: the directors of a building firm in hertfordshire have been given six month suspended sentences for the corporate manslaughter of one of their workers .
gareth jones , 28 , died when a wall collapsed at a building site in st albans .
welwyn-based linley developments , and directors trevor hyatt and alfred barker , have also been ordered to pay nearly £ 38,000 in costs .
author: Lee Agnew
BBC Three Counties Radio

documents.title: adam fanelli murder : two men jailed for life for beating scrap dealer to death
text: two travellers found guilty of beating a scrap metal dealer to death in buckinghamshire have been jailed for life .
adam fanelli , 31 , from dunstable , died when he was overpowered and held while blows rained down on his head and body .
addy mcallister , 34 , of charlesworth street , bolsover , and jemma price , 30 , of ridgeway , kensworth , were found guilty of murder at luton crown court .

documents.title: st albans road reopened after ambulance crash
text: bch road policing
roadpolicebch
watford road now reopened following earlier collision .
please call on 101 if you witnessed anything .
watford road now reopened following earlier collision .
please call on 101 if you witnessed anything .

documents.title: latest headlines : ambulance crash in st albans two men convicted of nash murder
text: the stories we 're looking at in beds , herts and bucks this afternoon :
author: Jane Killick
BBC Three Counties Radio

documents.title: biker left in ditch 'caught crumbly road surface '
text: a motorcyclist has told how he was left stranded for hours following a crash amid confusion between three police forces over county boundaries .

richard collins , 49 , from everton in bedfordshire , who broke his forearm in the accident near tilbrook , cambridgeshire , said he was eventually taken to bedford hospital in a bedfordshire police car .
`` i caught the crumbly road surface , went on to the wrong of the road and to avoid the oncoming traffic i went into the ditch , '' he said .
author: Andrew Woodger
BBC News

documents.title: beds on sunday : vandals deface olympian etienne stott 's plaque
text: police are looking for the criminals who have damaged bedford 's tribute to the town 's london 2012 olympic gold medallist , etienne stott .

documents.title: knickers model 's own : 'year of charity clothes ' wins award
text: a woman who started fundraising for charity by wearing charity shop outfits every day for a year has won the justgiving award for creative fundraiser of the year .

caroline jones started the knickers model 's own campaign in honour of her mother , mary benson , who volunteered in the cancer research uk shop in harpenden , hertfordshire for 13 years but died in october , aged 72 .
author: Dani Bailey
BBC Local Live

documents.title: st albans ambulance crash : recovery under way
text: the recovery of an ambulance involved in a serious collision along watford road in st albans at about 10:00 this morning is now under way .
four people have been injured .
author: Tony Fisher
BBC Three Counties Radio

documents.title: confusion over where crash happened left motorcyclist stranded
text: a motorcyclist has revealed how he was left stranded for hours in tilbrook amid confusion between three police forces about which county he had crashed in .

richard collins , 49 , from bedfordshire , who broke his forearm in the accident , said : `` a member of the public made the emergency call there was no sign of them after an hour , so i called them back .
at 18:00 , there was still no one at the scene . ''
author: Sally Chidzoy
BBC Look East home affairs correspondent

documents.title: potters bar murder was a debt collection 'gone wrong '
text: one of three men accused of murdering a wealthy gambler with a drug addiction in his home in hertfordshire over a £ 20,000 watch has told jurors it was a case of a debt collection `` gone wrong '' .
polish-born sebastian kimel , 40 , is accused of murdering milton papadopoulos ( 41 , in his potters bar flat last october .
he denies charges of murder , manslaughter and conspiracy to rob but has pleaded guilty to conspiracy to falsely imprison .
author: Dani Bailey
BBC Local Live

documents.title: mk dons to learn from southampton
text: mk dons manager karl robinson says premier league southampton represent the model he wants his club to follow after the saints beat his side 6-0 in the league cup yesterday .
`` they 've sold players and used the money to bring in better players and sold them on , '' said robinson .
`` it 's an amazing model . ''
author: Phil Shepka
BBC Sport

documents.title: gbbo : nadiya declares her dislike of cream horns
text: luton-raised nadiya made a bold declaration to the baking world in last night 's gbbo : `` if you ask me if i like cream horns , i will tell you no . ''
she had a bit of a tough time with her puff pastry leaking , but mary berry said her mocha hazelnut horns were `` a cracker '' .
author: Dani Bailey
BBC Local Live

documents.title: primary school pupil approached by man in luton
text: a boy has been approached by a man outside a primary school in luton .
he spoke to the boy near to the gates of downside primary in chaul end lane on tuesday and asked him to follow him .
the man , described as bald , black , of average height and wearing casual clothing , walked away when the child said he would find a teacher .
author: Jane Killick
BBC Three Counties Radio

documents.title: st albans ambulance crash : at the scene
text: i 'm at the scene of a serious road collision between an ambulance and a car in st albans .
a man 's been flown to hospital with critical injuries and an elderly woman has a serious head injury .
one member of the ambulance staff has gone to hospital with a chest injury , while a colleague has minor injuries .
author: Tony Fisher
BBC Three Counties Radio

documents.title: big brother row : vicki michelle 'pressing charges ' against farrah abraham
text: 'allo 'allo actress vicki michelle says that she wants to press charges against farrah abrahams .
hertfordshire police was called in after a row during big brother 's bit on the side at elstree studios on tuesday .
the actress said she was struck on the back of her head `` with great force with a glass '' .
author: BBC Newsbeat

documents.title: hs2 : chief executive says china bids will 'innovate '
text: the chief executive of hs2 , the first phase of which will cut through buckinghamshire , says appealing to businesses in china is a huge strategic investment '' .
simon kirby says they are encouraging international companies to collaborate with uk based companies '' to innovate '' for the new high-speed rail link .

documents.title: police refer themselves to ipcc after crash victim left in ditch
text: bedfordshire police has referred itself to the independent police complaints commission after a crash victim was left in a ditch due to confusion over who should attend the call .
the biker crashed near tilbrook , cambridgeshire - which borders bedfordshire and northamptonshire - on sunday and had to wait more than three hours for emergency services to arrive .
a statement issued by bedfordshire police said : `` the matter is being voluntarily referred to the independent police complaints commission . ''
author: Richard Haugh
BBC News

documents.title: lewis named boreham wood first-team coach
text: boreham wood have appointed former leeds united assistant manager junior lewis as their new first-team coach .
the 41-year-old former leicester midfielder was part of dave hockaday 's coaching staff at elland road at the start of last season .
author: Phil Shepka
BBC Sport

documents.title: adam fanelli murder : two men to be sentenced for murder
text: two men will be sentenced this afternoon at luton crown court after being found guilty of murdering scrap metal dealer adam fanelli .
the 31-year-old , who had been supplying addy mcallister , 34 , of charlesworth street , bolsover , and jemma price , 30 , of ridgeway , kensworth , with cocaine , was found dead in march .
author: Dani Bailey
BBC Local Live

documents.title: lunchtime headlines : ambulance crash in st albans hs2 bidding launched
text: the top stories this lunchtime :
author: Jane Killick
BBC Three Counties Radio

documents.title: st albans ambulance collision : roads closed by police
text: bch road policing
roadpolicebch
watford road , st albans , j/w st stephens way currently closed due to serious rtc
watford road , st albans , j/w st stephens way currently closed due to serious rtc

documents.title: breakingadam fanelli murder trial : two men found guilty
text: two men have been found guilty of the murder of adam fanelli , who was found dead at nash park travellers ' site in buckinghamshire in march .

documents.title: man injured in ambulance collision has critical injuries
text: a man , thought to be in his 50s , has been flown to the royal london hospital in london with critical injuries after an ambulance responding to a 999 call collided with a volkswagen polo in st albans this morning .
an elderly female , who sustained a serious head injury and suspected fracture , was taken to watford hospital by land ambulance .
two ambulance service staff were also taken to watford hospital .
one sustained a chest injury and the other was said to have minor injuries .

documents.title: st albans ambulance collision is 'serious '
text: a collision between an ambulance and a volkswagen polo in watford road , st albans has been described as `` serious '' by an east of england ambulance service spokesman .
the incident took place at 10:05 and it is reported the ambulance was on its side .
the road is currently closed at the junction with st stephens avenue and abbey avenue , while an air ambulance and the fire service work at the scene .

documents.title: breakingambulance in collision responding to 999 call
text: four people have been injured in a collision involving an ambulance responding to a 999 call in st albans .
no patients were on board .

documents.title: weather : more sunny spells this afternoon
text: this afternoon we 'll see continued sunny spells with the risk of some scattered , light showers .
maximum temperature : 17c ( 63f ) .
author: BBC Weather

martin anthony tett
matatbucks

documents.title: hs2 : still a long way to go , says chesham & amersham mp
text: companies in china are being invited to bid for hs2 building contracts despite legislation not being passed by parliament .
cheryl gillan , the conservative mp for chesham and amersham , has said there 's still a long way to go before the project 's given the go-ahead .
i worry about the stability around this project . ''
author: Dani Bailey
BBC Local Live

documents.title: bucks free press : woman sexually assaulted on the rye
text: a manhunt is under way after a woman was sexually assaulted on the rye in high wycombe .

documents.title: herts fire service meeting over appspond lane site
text: hertfordshire fire service will meet with the environment agency today to discuss how to manage the appspond lane recycling facility in hertfordshire after smoke was seen at the site this week .
conservative mp for st albans , ann main said the site should be cleared : `` it 's too wet , too damaged , too useless .
nobody wants the wood that 's on this site . ''

documents.title: gbbo : cream horns mean puff pastry flashbacks for luton 's nadiya
text: it was `` all or nothing '' for luton 's nadiya on this week 's great british bake off where bakers were first tasked with making cream horns for patisserie week .

the thought of making puff pastry again flustered nadiya a bit after a disastrous week with vol-au-vents in week six so she took judge paul hollywood 's advice not to `` lose her rag , '' and opted to bake rose pistachio and mocha hazelnut horns .
author: Dani Bailey
BBC Local Live

documents.title: appspond lane recycling site should be cleared , says st albans mp
text: the mp for st albans says a recycling facility , where a major blaze took hold three years ago , should be cleared and if it is n't the owners should be prosecuted .
ann main was speaking after firefighters were called to deal with large amounts of smoke from the appspond lane site earlier this week .
it 's just one big bonfire waiting to go up ''
author: BBC Three Counties Radio

documents.title: herts & essex observer : double-decker burials in bishop 's storford
text: limited burial space in cemeteries in bishop 's stortford has led the town council to turn to double-decking graves .

documents.title: st albans wall collapse death : executives to be sentenced
text: executives from a building firm who pleaded guilty to corporate manslaughter over a worker 's death will be sentenced today at st albans crown court .
gareth jones , 28 , died on 30 january 2013 when a wall collapsed on him in st albans while working for linley developments in welwyn garden city .

documents.title: morning headlines : hs2 bidding launched in china hertfordshire recycling facility should be cleared , says mp
text: the top stories for beds , herts and bucks this morning :
author: Simon Oxley
BBC Three Counties Radio

documents.title: bletchley park : gordon welchman exhibition opens today
text: a new exhibition opens at bletchley park today marking the work of codebreaker gordon welchman - known as the architect of modern intelligence .
mr welchman played a major part in breaking the german enigma code by adapting alan turing 's design for the code breaking bombe machine into a workable machine , and establishing hut 6 .
author: Lee Agnew
BBC Three Counties Radio

documents.title: hs2 : why the bill is likely to pass
text: labour conservatives both support hs2 so it is , at the moment , very likely to go through .
that 's despite the fact that clearly there 's plenty of opposition , either by people who live along the proposed route or those who think that it is simply too expensive .
author: Adam Parsons
Presenter, Wake up to Money

documents.title: mk dons out of league cup after southampton thrashing
text: milton keynes dons are out of the league cup after a 6-0 thrashing by premier league southampton at stadium : mk last night .
dons boss karl robinson said : `` what my players have learnt tonight is that the mentality of premier league players is n't just what 's in their boots , it 's what 's in their hearts and heads . ''
author: Luke Ashmead
BBC Three Counties Radio sport

documents.title: bucks fundraiser apologises for leaflets with image of dead syrian boy
text: a buckinghamshire fundraiser has apologised after using the image of dead syrian boy on a beach on leaflets to thousands of people .
john van weenen was trying to encourage people in olney to donate clothes for migrants at calais , but residents questioned why the .
of aylan kurdi had been used , with one person writing on facebook that they were horrified .
author: Jessica Cooper
BBC Three Counties Radio

documents.title: hs2 : chinese firms urged to bid £ 12b
text: george osborne has used his visit to china to launch the bidding process for constructing the uk 's proposed high speed two rail line .

the chancellor has urged chinese firms to pitch for almost £ 12 billion worth of contracts for the first phase through buckinghamshire , despite the fact the hs2 bill is still going through parliament .

documents.title: govia thameslink wo n't have enough drivers until easter
text: train operator govia say they wo n't have enough drivers until easter next year .

the announcement comes after hertfordshire county council complained about poor services on the thameslink and great northern lines , following the cancellation of trains this week due to driver shortages .
we do need about 150 more drivers than we 've currently got . ''

documents.title: travel : slow traffic on the m1 southbound
text: the m1 southbound j13-j12 is slow because of a broken down van .
there is congestion back to j14 .
a bit further down the carriageway there is more slow traffic through the roadworks around j11 .
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: latest headlines : govia thameslink wo n't have enough drivers until easter bucks fundraiser apologises for leaflets image
text: the top stories for the three counties so far :
author: Simon Oxley
BBC Three Counties Radio

documents.title: weather : cloud and rain clearing this morning
text: any cloud and rain will clear this morning to leave sunny periods and scattered light afternoon showers .
maximum temperature of 17c ( 63f ) .
author: Elizabeth Rizzini
BBC Look East weather

documents.title: welcome to thursday 's local live for beds , herts and bucks
text: good morning !
welcome to the local live page for bedfordshire , hertfordshire and buckinghamshire .
until 18:00 today we 'll bring you all the latest news , sport , weather and travel for the three counties .
if there 's something we should be talking about or you 'd simply like to get in touch , you can email us , tweet us or head over to our facebook page .
author: Dani Bailey
BBC Local Live
